Description: Ostracon, large section (two fragments) of the rim of a red-grey pottery storage-vessel with rounded and everted lip, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394026) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394026)
